Articles.Content:
I see the physics guys over there are having trouble expressing their equations correctly in plain text.

This is by no means an easy task, but is it possible to have LaTeX or mimeTeX or MathJax so that people can properly post math equations?

That came up a couple of times last year. [KasperVld's response is here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/77543-Latex-petition?p=1597846&viewfull=1#post1597846), but as he said you can use [codecogs](http://www.codecogs.com/latex/eqneditor.php) to generate images of the equations to post.

(Thread closed to avoid duplicates).
